sentences.en: " Now just wiggle your shoulders this way, " he said, " and let go. "
sentences.cn: “ 现在,你们像这样扭动肩膀, ” 他说, “ 起飞! ”

sentences.en: Ambiguous wording leaves some wiggle room for further negotiation.
sentences.cn: 措辞含糊能为日后协商留下回旋馀地.

sentences.en: Better get a wiggle on or we'll be late.
sentences.cn: 最好快一点,不然我们要迟到了.

sentences.en: Electrons can jiggle and wiggle in a more energetic manner.
sentences.cn: 原子能以更有力的方式旋转与振动.

sentences.en: Get a wiggle on, or you will be late.
sentences.cn: 快点, 不然你会迟到的.

sentences.en: He has gone wiggle - waggle and cannot be persuaded to categorical.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫不决,无法劝他持明确的态度.

sentences.en: The request left some wiggle room for future restructuring.
sentences.cn: 那个请求为将来的改组留下了一些回旋的余地.

sentences.en: There were three film cooling schemes used, namely, slot, discrete - hole and wiggle - strip.
sentences.cn: 采用的冷却方案共有3种, 分别是缝隙式 、 离散孔式和波纹板式气膜冷却方案.

sentences.en: When Jamie began to wiggle, he switched to Bible stories, which were more interesting.
sentences.cn: 待到杰米开始扭动身子想走开时, 他便改讲更有趣的《圣经》故事.

sentences.en: Wiggle , wiggle, wiggle your finger as quickly as you can.
sentences.cn: 摆动,摆动, 摆动你的手指, 尽可能的快.

sentences.en: Wiggle , wiggle, wiggle your fingers as quickly as you can.
sentences.cn: 摆动,摆动, 摆动你的手指, 尽可能地快.

sentences.en: WIGGLE THE WIRES BETWEEN THE TCM CONNECTOR AND THE PDC.
sentences.cn: 摇动TCM接头 和PDC间的导线束.

sentences.en: Wiggle your finger if you feel anything.
sentences.cn: 扭动你的手指如果你能感觉到任何东西.

words.tran_cn: 扭动的；左右摇摆的；起波的；蠕动的
摇摆的人；孑孓；蠕动的东西

trans.tran_en: to move with small movements from side to side or up and down, or to make something move like this
